name: Sway the Heart, Stoke the Spirit

description.value:
You orate an inspiring speech that rallies your allies, cleansing their body and mind of harmful conditions and stoking their spirit for the ongoing battle. If you say this speech, Sway the Heart, Stoke the Spirit gains the auditory trait. If you sign this speech, Sway the Heart, Stoke the Spirit gains the visual trait. You and all allies in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60] benefit from a 4th-rank @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Clear Mind] and a 4th-rank @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Sound Body] spell. Additionally, your allies gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves for 1 minute.
